content:
for professional team engagement
Architectural Development (Schematic Design)
Site plan overlays incorporating unit mix, grounds, and horizontal development
Massing studies showing building placement and site flow
Two concept renderings for stakeholder visualization
Preliminary design validation for the complete development
Civil Engineering (Pre-Development Phase)
Grading and drainage schematic for entire site
Utility routing concept design including infrastructure for grounds
Site constraints identification and mitigation strategies
Horizontal development planning (roads, parking, landscaping areas)
Contractor Engagement
Targeted quotes for SIP installation
Foundation work cost estimation
Site infrastructure pricing including grounds development
Horizontal development cost validation
Deliverables
Detailed cost scenarios (Low/Expected/High) for validated unit mix
Site plan overlays showing holistic development approach
Massing studies incorporating grounds and horizontal elements
Two professional concept renderings
Grading/drainage schematics for complete site
Utility routing concepts including grounds infrastructure
Site constraints memorandum with mitigation strategies
Contractor quote compilation for all site elements
Comprehensive feasibility brief with technical risk assessment
Professional work orders for validated development direction
Holistic Site Approach
This phase ensures the housing development is planned within the context of the complete site, including sustainable features like micro-parks and rain gardens, retail components, and all horizontal development elements that create a cohesive community environment.
Budget Allocation: $35,000
Note: Original $12,000 estimate was significantly below market rates. Professional architectural and civil engineering work for this scope typically requires $25,000-40,000 based on current market pricing.

Phase 4: Digital Platform Development
Institutional-Grade Website Launch
Obje
